room_title: Escape room "The Case of the Mad Scientist" by 59: Escape Adventures in Post Falls
room_address: 4294 W Riverbend Ave Post Falls, ID 83854
room_description:
A lethal virus that threatens the world…          
A long-awaited cure to benefit everyone…                                                   
A mad scientist working in a condemned research lab…  
And a global group that threatens it all…              
Are you the brave team that can find the answers to save all mankind?
